name: Astroturkeys
0:
”Alexa, Open Astroturkeys”
”Alexa, Start Astroturkeys”
”Give me more time”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: astro turkeys
des:
Crack codes. Defend your town. SAVE THE WORLD from a crazed invasion of cybernetic turkeys! Help Cousin Raylene solve increasingly difficult sequencing puzzles to activate the tower defenses that keep the Astroturkeys at bay.
The more you progress the more you learn about the Astroturkeys—
Get ready to:
● Defend the town of Ding Dong.
● Strategize!! Chose which defence towers to upgrade to.
● Campaign! Your progress is saved.
● Discover! Unock different mutations of Astroturkeys as you progress
● Achieve different victories: Regional Victory. Continental Victory. Ultimate World Victory!
● Advance your skills and beat your score.
● Laugh! Some of the defence towers are a little bit crazy. But there’s always a pattern.
● Experience rich audio and gameplay.
● Fully multi-modal. Watch the Astroturkeys advance on your town
● And more!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
